kamikaze.description: [MAFIA] [DAY] Also called suicide-bomber. During voting round, kamikaze can kill themselves and take down another person with them. Voting is cancelled, and two deaths are recorded.
kamikaze.role: During the day, announce suicide bombing in progress and tell who is the target

framer.description: [MAFIA] Also called forger. Assigns a person to be framed that night. If cop checks that person, narrator is supposed to say Mafia.
framer.role: At night, Tell who to frame
framer.narrator: During night, ask who to frame and note down. If cop asks about that person, say Mafia

silencer.description: [MAFIA] Assigns a person to be silenced during the day.
silencer.role: At night, tell who to silence
silencer.narrator: During night, ask who to silence and note down. During the day, announce who is silenced. If Doc visited that person, silencing doesn't work

godfather.description: [MAFIA] If cop checks this person, Narrator has to say Villager.
godfather.role: Behave like normal mafia. But be aware that cop check with show villager
godfather.narrator: If cop asks about Godfather, say Villager

idiot.description: [NEUTRAL] Wins if voted out during the day. Loses if survives or killed by Mafia.
idiot.role: Try to get voted out during the day
idiot.narrator: Announce if killed during the night

deputy.description: [VILLAGE] Arrests someone during the night. They cannot vote next day, but can participate in discussion.
deputy.role: During night, tell who to arrest
deputy.narrator: Note down who is under arrest at night

granny.description: [VILLAGE] Anyone who points to granny at night dies. If Mafia points, closest mafia dies.
granny.narrator: At the end of night round, check who all have visited granny. Everyone dies. If mafia tries to kill granny at night, kill the closest mafia

creep.description: [VILLAGE] Can check one person, and know the closest person who visited them that night. Must be the last role checked during the night.
creep.role: During night, tell a person to stalk. You'll know 1 or each person who visited them.
creep.narrator: during night round, ask about this role last.

gravedigger.description: [VILLAGE] Can speak to dead people and revive them at night, but have to sacrifice themselves.
gravedigger.role: During night, tell which dead person is to be revived
gravedigger.narrator: During night, ask who is to be revived. If killed during the same night, revival doesn't count

sniper.description: [VILLAGE] Can kill a person during the night. Sided with village
sniper.role: During night, tell who is to be sniped
sniper.narrator: If snipe is on granny, kill sniper. or kill person, unless saved by the doc.

bulletproof.description: [VILLAGE] Has two lives if Mafia kill at night. Dies if voted out
bulletproof.narrator: Check if person who is dying at night is bulletproof. In which case, announce nobody died (Bulletproof).

doc.description: [VILLAGE] Can save a person at night (including themselves). Killed if tries to save granny.
doc.role: During night, ask who is to be saved.
doc.narrator: Check if person dying(killed by mafia/sniper) is saved by the doc. Check if doc is visiting granny.

cop.description: [VILLAGE] Investigates a person, and narrator tells mafia/village according to role, unless Framed/Godfather. Dies at night if they visit Granny
cop.role: At night, ask who to investigate
cop.narrator: Mafia if the person is mafia/framed by framer. Villager if Godfather/otherwise
